w :  do you know yao ming ?
m :  yes .  he is one of the best basketball players in the world .  he is known not only in china  but also in many other countries all over the world .

question: what does the man think of yao ming ?
choice: he is the tallest basketball player in the world .
he is famous all over the world .
he is only well known in china .
answer: he is famous all over the world .
